thread.title: Saudis, U.A.E. Face Risk of Backlash as They Embrace

author: Yaroslav Trofimov
title: Saudis, U.A.E. Face Risk of Backlash as They Embrace
text:
Saudi Arabia and its increasingly important ally, the United Arab Emirates, have never enjoyed such a close relationship with an American president.
The challenge for these two monarchies now is to make sure that the personal bond they’ve carefully cultivated with President Donald Trump doesn’t backfire over the longer run—and doesn’t drag them into America’s divisive domestic politics.
There... RELATED VIDEO Prince Mohammed bin Salman's Ambitious Plans for Saudi Arabia Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman has huge ambitions for change in Saudi Arabia. But will his reforms also mean greater turbulence in the Middle East? WSJ's Niki Blasina reports. Photo: Getty
